content: quote: The number of employees working at the dealerships that are being notified is not yet known. The average dealership has about 52 employees, according to the National Automobile Dealers of America, meaning about 57,000 workers could lose their job as a result of Friday's action. All told, the planned dealership cuts at Chrysler and GM will eventually cost 140,000 jobs, NADA estimates. In a mere two days, Obama's economy saw 150,000 jobs lost, but we've got hope and change to pay the bills Why is he allowing the economy to swirl more vigorously down the toilet??
